A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is the worst SW movie ever made. All the prequels that has been so criticized are better films than this one. The story is awful\, badly written. All the interesting story elements from The Force Awakens are destroyed in this movie. As a fan of the series you end up feeling NOTHING for all the characters. Luke Skywalker returns after 30 years\, and it ends up being a complete disaster.

How could Lucasfilm and Disney approve to release this movie? 
Feels like a bad dream\, but no\, this is real. :'(
